# Phase 1: Complete Compliance Templates

**Phase:** Phase 1 - Quick Wins  
**Priority:** High  
**Due Date:** April 2025  
**Budget:** $0

## Description

Complete all remaining policy templates and compliance documentation to finish Phase 1 of the Lean Tech Roadmap.

## Tasks

### Conditional Access Policies
- [ ] Validate all existing CA policy templates
- [ ] Test policy deployment scripts
- [ ] Document policy implementation guide
- [ ] Create policy rollback procedures

### Compliance Documentation
- [ ] Complete SOX mapping sections
- [ ] Complete GDPR mapping sections
- [ ] Complete HIPAA mapping sections
- [ ] Add NIST framework mapping
- [ ] Add AICPA SOC 2 controls

### Testing & Validation
- [ ] Test all PowerShell scripts
- [ ] Validate YAML syntax in all policy files
- [ ] Run security scans
- [ ] Generate compliance reports

### Documentation
- [ ] Update README with completion status
- [ ] Create policy deployment runbook
- [ ] Document lessons learned
- [ ] Update PROJECT-STATUS.md

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All policy templates are validated and documented
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline passes all checks
- [ ] Security scan shows no critical issues
- [ ] Compliance mapping document is 100% complete
- [ ] All scripts have been tested successfully

## Dependencies

- CI/CD workflow (✅ Complete)
- E5 tenant configuration (✅ Complete)

## Budget Impact

**Expected Cost:** $0  
**Actual Cost:** $0

## Timeline

- **Start Date:** January 2025
- **Target Completion:** April 2025
